label: AB4C8_hR13_160_a_ab_2a2b-001
title: Low Temperature GaMo$_{4}$S$_{8}$ Structure
comments:
At temperatures below 45K GaMo$_{4}$S$_{8}$ transforms from its \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4C8_cF52_216_a_e_2e-001}{high-temperature cubic structure} to this rhombohedral structure. 
 We use the data from (Fran\c{c}ois, 1991) at 8K. 
 Space group $R3m$ \#160 allows a arbitrary choice of the zero of the $z$-axis.  Here we use this freedom to place the gallium atom at the origin ($z_{1} = 0$).
